summary: Adds 3 standalone followers. Azael the Vampire, Nix the SnowElf and Navitas the Orc.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Georgia][SIZE=9]SKY Standalone Uniques[/SIZE]

[url=http://imgur.com/0OE9R5U][img]http://i.imgur.com/0OE9R5U.jpg[/img][/url]

[size=6]Azael The Imperial  Vampire Mage
[i]Nix the SnowElf Ice Mage[/i]
Navitas the Orc Tank[/size]

[size=6]Requirements[/size]
[size=2]
-Skyrim Version 1.9.32.0.8 or higher.
[/size]-Dawnguard

[b][size=6]Installation [/size][/b]

Download and install with NMM or manually download and unpack the file and then move the “data” folder to your Skyrim data folder. 
This mod is not made for a torrented game, and If you have any problems using it with a torrent game, I will not provide support.

[b][size=6]Uninstallation [/size][/b]

Uninstall with NMM or manually delete all the files that came in the “data” folder listed in the mod.

[size=6][b]Notes[/b]
[/size]
Each follower has customized combat, and I took the time to create a new individualized class for each follower. Unp, Cbbe, SeveNBase and BBP-TBBP body options are available.  Azael has fangs. Nix is not listed under the Snow Elf Race, due to the fact the Snow Elf Race can not wear other armors, she has the same attributes as the Bethesda Snow Elf Race, also skin and hair color are kept lore friendly. Please no hate on how the followers look, I understand everyone has their own preference, keep negative comments to yourself. User photos are greatly appreciated, as well as endorsements if you enjoy the mod. 

[b][size=6]Where Can I Find Them?[/size][/b]

[size=5]College of Winterhold: Hall of the Elements[/size]
[size=4]Optional Dragonsreach relocation available.
[/size]
[size=3]Enb used in screenshots: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54362/?]Somber Enb 3[/url][/size]

[b][size=6]Credits[/size][/b]

[size=2]dimon99 for the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?]Unp Body[/url]
Caliente for the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]Cbbe Body[/url]
Was[/size][size=2]t1980 for the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36992/?]SeveNBase Body[/url]
HelloSanta for the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/?]SG Female Textures[/url] and
conversions of the hair meshes and textures from the SG hair pack
[/size][/font][size=2][font=Georgia]LogRaam for the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?]Eyes Of Beauty[/url]
nevenbridge81 for the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3589/?]Natural Eyes[/url]
lthot for the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411/?]Brows[/url]
zzjay for the [/font][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34346/?][font=Georgia]Smile in HD
[size=2][/size][/font][/url][font=Georgia][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34346/?][color=#f4f4f4]CherryHotaling for the [/color][/url][/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4888/?]BBP T[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4888/?]BBP Body
[/url][/font]Aipex8 for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/38829/?]BVFE Better Vampire Fangs & Eyes[/url]
[/size]
